channel.title: Nerd things and more...
channel.description: Recent content on Nerd things and more...

item.title: In the Beginning
item.description: First things first This place is going to be my personal blog. I am going to write about nerd things I don't generally speak with people. Such things include: Emacs, linux, vim, encryption and a e s t h e t i c s. This blog is hosted in github, written in Emacs with org-mode and posted with Hugo (This is one of the topics I'll be posting later: How to blog with github and Hugo).
